channel.title: Some football club images i made
channel.description: most are english except for Barcelona. Let me know what you think The wigan one was my first and then sunderland after that i stopped for about a month then made some more so you can see the difference between some of them Football Club images: [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/Football%20Sigs/Sunderland.png[/img] [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/Football%20Sigs/WiganAthletic.png[/img] [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/Football%20Sigs/BoltonWanders.png[/img] [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/Football%20Sigs/LeicesterCityFC.png[/img] [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/Football%20Sigs/FCBarcelona.png[/img] [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/Football%20Sigs/WatfordFC.png[/img]

item.title: Some football club images i made
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

i didn’t just copy and paste
the barce one for example i took the background then did fresco then blur slightly then lens corrected the logo
with the leiscter logo i make a duplicate layer called Ghost enlarged and took down the transparency and i took the pransparency of the wirting down. The Watford one i took the background image lightened alittle and sharpened the bolton one i patterend the background then clouded it and took transparency down. the sunderland admittably i only added a sunburst but i made that ages ago with the wigan one i just put on background and that was made ages before the sunderland one

Read full topic

item.title: Some football club images i made
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

exe626:

I believe this is a discussion of the graphical work, and in all honesty, in the nicest way I can put it, Suck hardcore.

ok how can i improve i can take it in the teeth
also watford aren’t crap we are top of the championship but for alphabetical order and after the leicester game this weekend we will be top of the championship and back in the premiership next year
